trans-unit.source: Represents a panel that arranges the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup"></xref> objects in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Representa um painel que organiza a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup"> </xref> objetos em um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonGroupsPanel"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonGroupsPanel"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the current layout pass is after the star layout pass.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a fase de layout atual após a fase de estrela de layout.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current pass is a star layout pass; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a fase atual for uma passagem de estrela de layout; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Measures the child elements in this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonGroupsPanel"></xref> in preparation of arranging them during the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel.ArrangeOverride*> pass.
trans-unit.target: Mede os elementos filho neste <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonGroupsPanel"> </xref> na preparação de organizando-los durante o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel.ArrangeOverride*>aprovados.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel.ArrangeOverride*>

trans-unit.source: Registers an element to participate in the star layout.
trans-unit.target: Registra um elemento para participar no layout de estrela.

trans-unit.source: Removes an element from participation in the star layout.
trans-unit.target: Remove um elemento da participação no layout de estrela.
